name: Lady Stalker: Kako Kara No Chousen
overview: There once was a very rich family who had a daughter named Lady. They loved Lady very much, but she was something of a delinquent. Where Lady went, destruction followed. In order to curb her destructive tendencies, the family locked Lady up in a mansion, and left two servants- a cook and a gardener- to watch her. However, one day Lady heard of a place called Deathland Island, which was said to have a huge, ancient treasure. Determined to find this treasure, Lady made her escape...
